description:
A command-line tool to customize the official Spotify client.


compare changes🩹 Fixes
- apply: Check for old global navbar existence (768cb4b)
- new-releases: Use hardcoded queryArtistDiscographyAll def (#3166)
- preprocess: Add new regex to catch variable names for context menu (8e1926d)
🏡 Chore
- sidebarConfig: Change how msg is shown (bef76be)
❤️ Contributors
- ririxi (@rxri)
- Thomas Fitzpatrick (@ohitstom)
Compatibility
- Spotify for macOS: 1.2.14 -> 1.2.47
- Spotify for Linux: 1.2.14 -> 1.2.47
- Spotify for Windows/Microsoft Store: 1.2.14 -> 1.2.47
    - You may need to apply spicetify every time you close Microsoft Store version of Spotify
Attestion
You can now verify the releases by going to Attestions, selecting correct release and platform, then using the provided command pointing to spicetify binary from the zip.
